## TextCanvas.getMemoryUsage() method

Update the info with the memory footprint caused by objects owned by the `TextCanvas`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMemoryUsage(info: MemoryUsage): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  info | [MemoryUsage](./harp-text-canvas.memoryusage.md) | The info object to increment with the values from this <code>TextCanvas</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
